div.p: For further information concerning security claims, see Security Claim Types. This resource defines two search parameters for claims, "type" and "claim". type is a uri search that searches for any security principal resources with claims of a partocular type, but a URL. claim is a token search that searches both "type" and "claim" - if the token includes a namespace, portion, then the namespace portion relates to the security type (e.g. the "type" and "claim" correspond to "system" and "code" from a Coding data type for searching purposes).
The claims function as a Set - that is, the full set of claims for a principal is the union of the claims made for the principal itself, and those made for all the principal's groups.
